QuestData.Title: First One's Free
QuestData.Description:
The pocket-sized computational device can accept punch cards to upgrade and modify its performance.
I could give you a punch card, but a particularly crafty trogg, Moch'k Eight-Thumbs, stole my satchel full of cards.
Kill Moch'k Eight-Thumbs, recover my satchel, and I'll set you up with a punch card for free.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A notorious technology snatcher, who harasses Rustbolt citizens.
